entries: Your initiations into the Nexian mysteries and the philosophies of the Arclords of Nex grant you a preternatural comprehension of the arcane underpinnings of existence.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Intelligence or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.
You're trained in the {@skill Arcana} skill and a {@skill Lore} skill related to one plane of your choice (other than the Material Plane). You gain the {@feat Arcane Sense} skill feat.
